howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Ce service permet de connecter votre Jee: This service allows you to connect your Jeedom with voice assistants from Google and Amazon
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Ce service est payant et peut être sousc: This service is chargeable and can be subscribed on the Jeedom Market, in the [My Services] page (https
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Vous trouverez dans la documentation res: You will find in the respective documentation of the plugins their differences
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Ensuite une fois l'abonnement souscrit i: Then once the subscription is subscribed you must wait for synchronization (see next chapter)
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Vous pouvez faire la configuration en su: You can configure by following the documentation of the plugin
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Il y a des délai de synchronisation lors: There are synchronization delays during the following actions
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Achat d'année sur le service Assistant V: Purchase of year on the Voice Assistant service
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Changement de clef api du plugin Google: Change of API smarthome plugin API key
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.La synchronisation se fait toute les 6h: Synchronization takes place every 6 hours (at 12.10 a.m. 6.60.10.12.12.10.18.10)
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Cette synchronisation est du a notre vol: This synchronization is due to our desire to make the third-party server that bridges your Jeedom and the Google / Amazon infrastructure independent and autonomous (it avoids during a problem on the market for example also losing the voice assistant service)
howto\/assistant_vocaux_cloud.md.Lors de la synchronisation il y a un red: During synchronization there is a restart of the service (interruption of less than 1s), which explains the limitation to once every 6 hours

howto\/backup_cloud.md.Une fois le service acheté il faut dans: Once the service has been purchased, it is necessary in jeedom
howto\/backup_cloud.md.aller dans l'administration de celui-ci: go to the administration of it then in the tab "Update / Market" and fill
howto\/backup_cloud.md.nom du dossier ou mettre les backup de j: name of the folder or put the backups of jeedom (if you have a jeedom just put jeedom, otherwise put a folder by jeedom)
howto\/backup_cloud.md.ATTENTION si vous le perdez les backups: BE CAREFUL if you lose it the backups are lost it is impossible to recover the password
howto\/backup_cloud.md.dans la gestion des sauvegarde cochez la: in the backup management check the "Send backups" box at the "Market Backups" level
howto\/backup_cloud.md.Il est possible de voir les dossiers des: It is possible to see the jeedom backup files directly from your profile page on the market, tab my services then configuration at the level of the cloud backup service
howto\/backup_cloud.md.Erreur Specification mandate value for a: Error Specification mandate value for attribute defer on line 19, column 146
howto\/backup_cloud.md.Si vous avez cette erreur il faut contac: If you have this error you must contact the support, it is an error on our side at the level (hard drive of the backup server in readonly)
howto\/backup_cloud.md.Suite à la correction de notre coté il f: Following the correction on our side, you will probably have to force a reconfiguration of the cloud backup on your profile page (service tab then cloud backup)

howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Mettre en place le DNS Jeedom pour avoir: Set up Jeedom DNS to have access to your Jeedom externally via a HTTPS URL
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Le DNS Jeedom agis comme un reverse prox: The Jeedom DNS acts as a reverse proxy so it only gives access to your Jeedom in https, it will therefore not be possible to access your jeedom in SSH remotely with the Jeedom DNS
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Pour avoir accès aux DNS Jeedom il faut: To have access to Jeedom DNS it is absolutely necessary to have a service pack power or more
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Le principe du DNS Jeedom est très simpl: The principle of Jeedom DNS is very simple, your Jeedom will connect to one of our VPN servers (encrypted connection)
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Ensuite ce serveur en question chez nous: Then this server in question with us makes "reverse proxy" during the request
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.il prend votre demande de connexion à vo: it takes your request to connect to your jeedom and transfers it to it
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Ce principe a l'avantage de ne pas expos: This principle has the advantage of not exposing your Jeedom on the internet, no port opening to do
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Pour que cela fonctionne il faut que vot: For this to work, your box must allow an outgoing connection on ports 1194,1195,1996,1997,1198,1199,2000 and 2001 in UDP
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.En particulier pour les Livebox et route: In particular for the Huawei Livebox and 4g router, the firewall level must be lowered, for the Delta Freeboxes, parental control must be deactivated.
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Nous avons actuellement 6 serveurs DNS r: We currently have 6 DNS servers distributed on 2 different physical machines, each having a 500Mbit / s connection
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Là c'est super simple, vous devez connec: There it is super simple, you must connect your Jeedom to the market (see documentation first-step)
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Une fois votre Jeedom lié au market, vou: Once your Jeedom is linked to the market, you go to the market; then on your profiles (https
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.v=d&p=profils) et enfin sur l'onglet \"M: v = d & p = profiles) and finally on the tab "My Jeedoms
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Une fois le status du market à \"Connexi: Once the market status at "Connection possible", go to your Jeedom, in the administration of it go to the Networks tab and check "Use Jeedom DNS" then save
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Jeedom va démarrer le DNS et vous donner: Jeedom will start the DNS and give you your access url to your Jeedom
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Vous pouvez changer cette url en allant: You can change this url by going to your market profiles page then go to my Jeedoms
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Attention tout changement prend 24h avan: Please note any change takes 24 hours before being effective
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Voilà votre Jeedom est accessible de l'e: Here is your Jeedom is accessible from the outside in https
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Y a-t-il besoin d'ouvrir des ports sur m: Is there a need to open ports on my box
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Non il n'y a pas besoin d'ouvrir de port: No there is no need to open a port from your internet box to your Jeedom
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.La connexion est dans le sens Jeedom ->: The connection is in the Jeedom -> VPN direction, so it is an outgoing connection (on ports 1194,1195,1996 and 1997) and not an incoming connection
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Pourquoi le DNS Jeedom protège mon accès: Why Jeedom DNS protects my access to it
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Les DNS Jeedom permettent de mettre en p: Jeedom DNS allows you to set up something very important, HTTPS access, this guarantees that the connection between your browser and your Jeedom is encrypted, moreover the certificate being valid nobody will be able to impersonate your Jeedom
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Enfin la connexion VPN en votre Jeedom e: Finally the VPN connection in your Jeedom and our servers is also encrypted
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.J'ai changé le port d'écoute interne de: I changed the internal listening port of my Jeedom and the Jeedom DNS no longer work
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Effectivement le DNS Jeedom ne fonctionn: Indeed the Jeedom DNS only works if your Jeedom is listening on local port 80 (all the other ports are closed on the VPN interface when connecting)
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Cela ne pose pas de soucis de sécurité c: This does not pose security concerns because the VPN creates an encrypted tunnel, so even if the flow is in clear on port 80 it is encrypted in the VPN tunnel
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Je n'ai pas la page de connexion mais im: I don't have the login page but can't login
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Vérifiez que vous avez bien changé les i: Check that you have changed the default jeedom credentials (admin / admin) and that your user is not restricted locally only
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Ma configuration est bonne mais impossib: My configuration is good but impossible to have a page it turns endlessly
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Si votre configuration est bonne (Initia: If your configuration is correct (Initialization Sequence Completed in the log openvpn_DNS_Jeedom) but you cannot get the login page which works with the mobile application randomly and you are in 4g or at the end of the ADSL line
howto\/mise_en_place_dns_jeedom.md.Il faut dans ce cas cocher la case dans: In this case, you must check the box in the jeedom network configuration like what you are in 4g and relaunch the dns like that jeedom will change the mtu of your connection to reduce the size of the packets

howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Le monitoring cloud est un service Jeedo: Cloud monitoring is a paid Jeedom SAS service which permanently monitors your Jeedoms or your Jeedoms and warns you in case of problems
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.En fonction du nombre de mois pris vous: Depending on the number of months taken, you will have the right to free months
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.La liste de ce qui est surveillé évolue: The list of what is monitored evolves to try to be as reactive / proactive as possible, in the basic controls you have
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Vous êtes aussi prévenu lors d'un redema: You are also warned when your Jeedom restarts
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Sur le market a partir de votre page pro: On the market from your profile page then by clicking on information in the tab my service part service monitoring you have all the current data known on your jeedom and you can by clicking on graph see the history over the last 24h (we do not keep more data than the last 24 hours)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Par default vous êtes prévenu par un mai: By default you are notified by an email on your email configured in your profiles but you can in the configuration of cloud monitoring (on your market profiles page)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Mettre une autre adresse mail (une seule: Put another email address (only one possible)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ajouter une alerte sur Slack (il faut ju: Add an alert on Slack (just give the address of Webhook)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ajouter une alerte par SMS (attention ce: Add an SMS alert (note that this requires that you have SMS credit on the market)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ajouter une alerte par Notification (néc: Add an alert by Notification (requires the mobile app)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Vous pouvez trouver votre chatid a parti: You can find your chatid from jeedom by going to the telegram equipment then advanced configuration of the desired recipient's command then the information button and in the configuration field you have the chatid
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.La procedure est assez simple, il faut: The procedure is quite simple, you have to
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.avoir du crédit monitoring cloud (il s'a: have cloud monitoring credit (you can buy it in a 1 month batch, so you can take 2 months then stop 6 months and then resume after)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Après avoir ajouté du crédit monitoring: After adding cloud monitoring credit, you must either wait a few hours (around 24 hours), or in Jeedom, on the configuration section then update click on the "test" button for connection to the market (this forces Jeedom to recover market information and therefore the fact that the cloud monitoring service is active)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Ensuite vous pouvez voir dans la partie: Then you can see in the health section of Jeedom if it is active
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Il faut environ 10min pour qu'il se lanc: It takes approximately 10min for it to launch following synchronization with the market (click on the test button)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Lors de la premiere activation ou réacti: During the first activation or reactivation it is possible that you receive an email / telegram / slack / sms telling you that your Jeedom is not available
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.C'est normal c'est le temps que le Jeedo: It's normal, it's time for the Jeedom in question to activate the monitoring services.
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Une fois le service activé celui-ci surv: Once the service is activated, it monitors all Jeedom connected to your account
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Pour les notifications il suffit de récu: For notifications, just collect the arn from your mobile, it is located in the mobile plugin, on your mobile equipment, then access the "notification" tab, then copy the "ARN" line. that there is after "arn
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Je recois toute les 10 minutes un messag: I receive every 10 minutes a message telling me that jeedom has restarted when it is not true
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Cela arrive si vous avez plusieurs box J: This happens if you have several Jeedom boxes including 2 (or more) with the same installation key (Settings page -> System -> Configuration)
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Dans ce cas le market ne voit que une bo: In this case the market sees only one box, the monitoring system also except that once in 2 the time since which the machines started changes (one hit box 1, one hit box 2), hence the alerts
howto\/monitoring_cloud.md.Pour corrigé il suffit dans un des jeedo: To correct it is enough in one of the jeedoms on the page where there is the installation key to do "Reset
